title: Client Randomly Closing
body:
Pretty much as the title says, most of the time the client will close after I click on Hextech crafting but recently its been happening much more even during champ select which annoys me to no end. Wondering if this is an issue on Riots or my end. Oh and if anyone knows of a way to reduce the chances of this happening again that would be appreciated.

Thanks~
 
Edit: I forgot to mention the client will randomly glitch out in champ select and things will be everywhere i'll see if I can get a screenshot of it if it happens again. https://gyazo.com/488af474153b9867038fae87c1d193d1

replies.body:
Hey there,

This sounds like it might be connection related.

Could you please run through everything outlined in the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) support article for me and let me know if anything helps.

Hey i'll run a repair tonight and If doesn't fix the problems i'll go through the link you sent properly. Tbh I don't think its connection related as everything's been fine up until the last 2 patches but I'll try anyways
That screenshot you edited into the OP *DEFINITELY* makes me think it's a connection issue.
